attributes.action: offer tax rebates to people who have no children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large number of people in this country contribute to education even though they have no children. It is about time that people who have no children were offered a tax rebate for not contributing to planetary over population which is the true cause of global warming

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
